layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutBlockFlow (anonymous) at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 119x19
          text run at (0,0) width 119: "TR VALIGN=TOP"
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,20) size 784x195 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 782x193
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 782x189
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 304x189 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutImage {IMG} at (2,2) size 300x185
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (308,2) size 235x44 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 216x39
                text run at (2,2) width 216: "This text should be vertically aligned"
                text run at (2,22) width 58: "to the top"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (545,2) size 235x44 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=2 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 216x39
                text run at (2,2) width 216: "This text should be vertically aligned"
                text run at (2,22) width 58: "to the top"
